attributes.action: Prevet further spread of Islam and building of mosques in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many britsh citizens are concerned with the speed and ease that islam is spreading through our nation. islamasists do not try to fit in with local customs or traditions.  they do not recognise our laws and values. if the islamification of the uk is allowed to continue, then the freedoms and democracy we have now could be threatened. (mostly by sharia law)

We, the people of britain, demand the right to be heard. and for this issue to be publicly debated.

rejection.details: Planning is an issue for the appropriate local authority.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
